plot: The film opens in a picturesque back street of a Spanish town, where an artist is busy at his easel. Chapo, the little hunchback, sees him and lingers by the artist. Pedestrians come and go...
title: Vengeance Is Mine
plot_es: The film opens in a picturesque back street of a Spanish town, where an artist is busy at his easel. Chapo, the little hunchback, sees him and lingers by the artist. Pedestrians come and go...
